name: Whiterun Guard
stunts: Shield Wall: +2 to Defend when fighting alongside other guards
Alert: +2 to Notice when on patrol duty
Loyal to the Jarl: Once per session, automatically succeed on a Will defense against intimidation

trust_clock.description: Represents how much the guard trusts the party

notes: Standard Whiterun guards are professional soldiers dedicated to protecting the city. They're loyal to Jarl Balgruuf and take their duties seriously. While initially suspicious of strangers, they can become valuable allies if the party proves themselves.

quirks: Stands at attention when addressing superiors

combat_tactics: Guards prefer to fight in formation with shields raised. They'll call for backup if outnumbered and prioritize protecting civilians.
